Bernstein BMRN 1 the expression levels achieved in the ph3 data are coming in short of what was achieved in the ph12 data 2 three patients in the ph3 interim analysis cohort failed to achieve levels 5 IUdL These raise a couple of commercial concerns With ph3 data coming in below ph12 data this could make it more difficult for Valrox to show clear superiority over existing therapeutic options such as Hemlibra While a 15 failure rate is not bad for a first gene therapy this could make the drug less attractive to patients physicians and leaves more room for future entrants to improve on the clinical profile
Guggenheim BMRN Peak FVIII production appears to be lower in this Ph3 cohort Three patients did not achieve FVIII levels 5 One patient is bleeding quite a lot and is receiving prophylactic therapy
